contactForm.title: Get in Touch
contactForm.description: Ready to make care-giving easier? Let's start the conversation.
contactForm.successMessage: Thank you! We'll be in touch soon.
contactForm.errorMessage: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again.
contactForm.consentText: By clicking the button, you agree that your personal data (name, email address, and phone number if provided) will be processed for contact purposes.
contactForm.revokeConsent: You can revoke your consent at any time by sending an email to klaro.carely@gmail.com. For more information about the processing of your personal data, please refer to our privacy policy.
